definition: become active and spew forth lava and rocks
details:
verb
- become active and spew forth lava and rocks
= example: become active and spew forth lava and rocks
= synonyms: belch
- erupt or intensify suddenly
= example: erupt or intensify suddenly
= synonyms: flare
- become raw or open
= synonyms: recrudesce, break out
- start abruptly
= synonyms: break out
- appear on the skin
= example: appear on the skin
- break out
= example: break out
= synonyms: come out, break through, push through
- force out or release suddenly and often violently something pent up
= synonyms: break
- start to burn or burst into flames
= synonyms: combust, ignite, catch fire, take fire, conflagrate
